casebody.data:
C. C. WATSON, as Next Friend of Duran Eugene Watson, a minor, et al., Plaintiffs-Appellees, v. C. W. THOMPSON, Superintendent of Pittsburg County Line Consolidated Independent School District, et al., Defendants-Appellants. No. 71-1478. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. May 19, 1972. L. E. Bell, Jr., Pittsburg, Tex., for defendants-appellants. W. C. Hancock, Pittsburg, Tex., for plaintiffs-appellees.

Before BELL, AINSWORTH and GODBOLD, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

The judgment of the district court, 321 F.Supp. 394, is vacated and the cause is remanded for further proceedings not inconsistent with Karr v. Schmidt, 5 Cir., 1972, 451 F.2d 1023 (En Banc).

Vacated and remanded with direction.
